name: azure-devops-branch-helper
title: Azure DevOps Helper
description: Fetch Azure DevOps work items and generate standardized Git branch names
author: tor_gjosaeter

commands.name: branchname
commands.title: Generate Branch Name
commands.description: Convert task description to branch name format

preferences.name: branchPrefix
preferences.title: Branch Prefix
preferences.description: The prefix to use for branch names (e.g., 'tor/', 'feature/')

preferences.name: azureOrganization
preferences.title: Azure DevOps Organization URL
preferences.description: Your Azure DevOps organization URL (e.g., https://dev.azure.com/myorg)

preferences.name: azureProject
preferences.title: Azure DevOps Project (Optional)
preferences.description: Default project name for Azure DevOps queries

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
